page.title: 15Brenchley Garage - Facts.
page.content: Brenchley Garage is open on weekdays: {8.00am}to{6.00pm,}and on Saturday:{ {8.30am}to{1.00pm.}They provide petrol, mechanical and bodywork services.The{ {24 hour breakdown service}is on a police call out system.They have specialist "SUN" electrical equipment to help service the vehicles. They{sell}car cleaning equipment and spare parts.{Buying}and{selling cars} is only a small proportion of the business.They sell approximately{1200 {gallons}of petrol a week,the petrol tanker comes once every fortnight. There is a workforce of {8,}with{1}in training.The garage has to follow strict{ministry regulations}concerning {safety.}Most of the workforce live locally and like their job because it is:interesting,a chance to meet people or they like getting dirty.
